QuestData.Title: Those Aren't Masks
QuestData.Description: $n, there are these demon squid-things out there that are eating gilblins' heads and then taking them over! That's one way to get slaves.$B$BThink you could swim out northwest onto Deepfin Ridge or into the Sira'kess Front and bring me back some of those Merciless things?
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, they're ugly, but they mostly look harmless. Smelly though.$B$BHere, let me clean the gilblin stuff out of these. I've got an idea....
